data.question: What is the empirical formula of 1(cid:138)anisole?
What is the crystal system of 1(cid:138)benzonitrile?
What is the maximum adsorption amount of O2 by the porous coordination polymer?
What method was used for single crystal X-ray diffraction data collection?
data.answer: Rigaku mercury diffractometer with a graphite monochromated MoKα radiation and a CCD detector

data.question: What is the role of the TCNQ-TCNQ dimers in the porous coordination polymer?
data.answer: They form durable CH–π-type interactions with aromatic protons and are involved in the selective sorption of oxygen and nitric oxide.

data.question: Why does the porous coordination polymer selectively sorb O2 and NO over other gases?
data.answer: Due to the charge-transfer interaction between TCNQ and these guests, and the switchable gate opening and closing of the pores of the framework.

What is the role of the N2 atmosphere during the synthesis of [Zn(TCNQ-TCNQ)bpy]•1.5benzene?
data.answer: It provides an inert environment to prevent unwanted reactions.

data.question: Why is the yield of the synthesis of [Zn(TCNQ-TCNQ)bpy]•1.5benzene high?
data.answer: Due to the controlled slow addition of reactants and the purification process.
